author: thejas
msg: HIVE-4871 : Apache builds fail with Target "make-pom" does not exist in the project "hcatalog". (Eugene Koifman via Ashutosh Chauhan)

author: shaie
msg: LUCENE-5262: StandardDirectoryReader should decRef readers on exception, not close them

author: jawi
msg: - this makes this bundle no longer runnable on Java 6 and below;
- Jetty 9 no longer explicitly needs to be configured to use NIO,
this is handled internally in Jetty;
- still needs some additional TLC to see where we can improve the
implementation to use the latest features of Jetty.
